title: FT-IR micro-spectroscopy of fine-grained planetary materials: further results
abstract: We present data from FT-IR microspectroscopy of olivines in a thin section of the LL3.6 ordinary chondrite Parnallee. Results are discussed and compared with other methods of FT-IR microspectroscopy
